Yes, but Kusunagi is gone. You can believe the myth that the sword survived=
.. but that sword is long gone. Just like the Northern Imperial line is a p=
retender to the throne, so is that alleged sword probably just a replica.=
=C2=A0But-- aside from whether the sword still exist or not --- the sword w=
as/is not sacred because it is a sword-- but because of what that sword rep=
resents.
=C2=A0Don't forget--- at the time Kusunagi became sacred.. the swo=
rd was not yet "the soul of the samuraI"---- that position was still being =
filled by the Bow and Arrow (remember, this sword was made and already a "S=
acred" object by the 700s). 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0 Because of the dates of the swor=
d, I would highly suggest that it is sacred because it was found inside Oro=
chi... But it was often blamed for causing Illness, so it wasn't wielded an=
ymore, just kept in a shrine. 
=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 
=C2=A0 If Susano had fou=
nd a knife or spear in Orochi, then THAT weapon would have been the piece o=
f the Imperial Regalia.
=C2=A0
=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 A=
gain, it is not that it is a SWORD.. it is WHAT it represents, which is cou=
rage, valor, bravery, etc.etc...
=C2=A0
=C2=A0But, more than that .. here i=
s why the sword is sacred :
=C2=A0
=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=

en to Amaterasu by Susano in apology. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0=C2=A0 It is sacred bec=
ause it REPRESENTS Susano's apology. A bow or spear would have worked equal=
ly.=C2=A0 *Also, it is safe to say that Kusunagi WAS NOT a "katana"... but =
more of a chinese/korean straight sword, I think*
=C2=A0

 The Imperial Regalia is sacred because they are directly related to bringi=
ng Amaterasu BACK from hiding...
=C2=A0
=C2=A0 Again, it is not the object =
itself, but what it represents.
=C2=A0

=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 SOME shinto followers MAY believe these objects po=
ssess souls, but many Bushi families and their descendents (such as my fami=

 beliefs as much as someone who are non-Buddhas and shinto.. So the "religi=
ous orientation" of the clan/family must be taken into account as well.
=C2=

=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=
